```
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: random-generator
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: random-generator
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: random-generator
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: k8spatterns/random-generator:1.0      ![1](assets/1.png)
        name: random-generator
        env:
        - name: LOG_FILE                             ![2](assets/2.png)
          value: /logs/random.log
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:                                ![3](assets/3.png)
        - mountPath: /logs
          name: log-volume
      # --------------------------------------------
      - image: k8spatterns/random-generator-exporter ![4](assets/4.png)
        name: prometheus-adapter
        env:
        - name: LOG_FILE                             ![5](assets/5.png)
          value: /logs/random.log
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9889
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:                                ![6](assets/6.png)
        - mountPath: /logs
          name: log-volume
      volumes:
      - name: log-volume                             ![7](assets/7.png)
        emptyDir: {}
```
